input.sentences: the sign lit up the entrance .
the buildings seemed to span for miles .
we made sure to stop inside .
the bridge looked very tall from the ground .
we stopped in the gift shop as well .
output.sentences: It was our first night in California.
And we walk the strip, stopping in all the stores.
Red Hollywood signs light up the whole street.
We even got a chance to walk some movie sets.
At the end of the night, we stopped by the Disney store.
